jobapplications_key1:
name: Email Writing Exercise - Job Applications
submission_type: url
jobapplications_key2: Neeche kuch job descriptions diye gae hain. Aapko in job descriptions ke liye apply karte hue ek email compose karna hai.
jobapplications_key3: Email compose karte waqt neeche di gai cheezon ka dhyan rakhein:
jobapplications_key4: Sabse pehle job ki requirements aur description ko achhi tarah se padhein aur samjhein.
jobapplications_key5: Company ke baare mein jo details di gai hain, unko achhi tarah se samjhein.
jobapplications_key6: Email me subject line, greeting, introduction, closing, etc. saare parts ko achhe se likhein.
